channel.title: How do i change the death method
channel.description: Hey Mopar users :) im having someproblems ive set up a server using the tokkulscape v3.5 source. The problem is the source comes default with a lame drop system and also u dont lose items wen u die? How could i make it so that when u die u lose your items and if in wildy or bounty hunter be able to be picked up by the killer. All help much appreciated

item.title: How do i change the death method
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

oh you are smart thats the thing i miss to thx

Read full topic
